Body: So now when the new Lollipop is on it's way we all have our feeds filled with magazines or sites telling us how awesome LG or Samsung is to release Lollipop so soon.My question is,Why is this such a hard thing to do?How come it's much easier to switch from Windows to Linux on a PC? Or even switch hardware product and download a driver? Why aren't the drivers or hardware products in our phones compatible with every operating system or phone model just like a PC?Okay, screen sizes may differ, but a vibrator will still work as a vibrator.YElp!
Title: What makes porting so difficult?

history.Text: So now when the new Lollipop is on it's way we all have our feeds filled with magazines or sites telling us how awesome LG or Samsung is to release Lollipop so soon.My question is,Why is this such a hard thing to do?How come it's much easier to switch from Windows to Linux on a PC? Or even switch hardware product and download a driver? Why aren't the drivers or hardware products in our phones compatible with every operating system or phone model just like a PC?Okay, screen sizes may differ, but a vibrator will still work as a vibrator.YElp!
